text:
[Verse]
Feel the drops fall on my face
Every heartbeat a new chase
Splashing puddles run and race
In this moment find my place

[Verse 2]
Sky is grey but I don't mind
In the storm my joy I find
Feet are light leave cares behind
Every step the world unwind

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain I'm free
Just the rhythm and me
Spinning wild like the sea
Dancing in the rain I'm free

[Bridge]
Clouds of silver sky's embrace
In the rain I find my space
Every droplet a soft grace
In this storm my heart's base

[Verse 3]
Lightning strikes I feel no fear
In this dance we're all near
Thunder's song is clear
In this rain we disappear

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain I'm free
Just the rhythm and me
Spinning wild like the sea
Dancing in the rain I'm free
title: Dancing in the Rain
